# CMDeviceMotion.SensorLocation.headphoneRight

**Case**

The sensor is in the right headphone.

## Declaration

```swift
case headphoneRight
```

## Sensor Locations

- **CMDeviceMotion.SensorLocation.default**: The default sensor location.
- **CMDeviceMotion.SensorLocation.headphoneLeft**: The sensor is in the left headphone.

items.description: The sensor is in the left headphone.
